name: Agatha Adventure 128K
description:
The game is available in 128K,  the difference with the 48K version is the addition of music. 

This is an arcade, puzzle adventure, etc.

You have to take Agatha to discover how  to cross  different rooms,  taking and placing  blocks,  moving ice blocks to catch or avoid dogs.

Controls

All keys are re-definable. Default keys:

Q ----- Placing blocks and arrows

Z -----Jump

O ----- Left

P -----Rright

N ----- Music OFF/ON

H ----- Pause

Also supports Kempston & Sinclair Joysticks 

Also gluten Free
